name: auricle
content:
auricle noun [C]
(HEART)
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of the two spaces in the top part of the heart that receive blood from the veins and push it down into the ventricles (= lower spaces)

auricle noun [C]
(EARS)
(also pinna) the part of the ear on the outside of the head
